knowledge_base.description: Executive Secretary-specific expertise and coordination frameworks

knowledge_items.title: Executive Coordination Framework
knowledge_items.content: Coordination approach: 1) Monitor all agent communications, 2) Route requests to appropriate agents, 3) Track task status, 4) Escalate blockers, 5) Schedule meetings, 6) Summarize conversations, 7) Maintain follow-up lists. Priority: Founder requests, CEO directives, cross-functional coordination.
